verses.verse: אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> There was a man הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> in the land ע֖וּץ <S%H5780><s%> of Uz אִיּ֣וֹב <S%H347><s%> [was] Job שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and that man הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he תָּ֧ם <S%H8535><s%> was perfect וְיָשָׁ֛ר <S%H3477><s%> and upright וִירֵ֥א <S%H3373><s%> and one that feared אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God וְסָ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> and eschewed מֵרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> evil
וַיִּוָּ֥לְדוּ <S%H3205><s%> And there were born ל֛וֹ שִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7651><s%> unto him seven בָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וְשָׁל֥וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three בָּנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> daughters

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become מִ֠קְנֵהוּ <S%H4735><s%> His substance שִֽׁבְעַ֨ת <S%H7651><s%> also was seven אַלְפֵי־ <S%H505><s%> thousand צֹ֜אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep וּשְׁלֹ֧שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> and three אַלְפֵ֣י <S%H505><s%> thousand גְמַלִּ֗ים <S%H1581><s%> camels וַחֲמֵ֨שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מֵא֤וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred צֶֽמֶד־ <S%H6776><s%> yoke בָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> of oxen וַחֲמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אֲתוֹנ֔וֹת <S%H860><s%> she asses וַעֲבֻדָּ֖ה <S%H5657><s%> household רַבָּ֣ה <S%H7227><s%> great מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> and a very וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> so that this man הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> was the greatest מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of all the men קֶֽדֶם׃ <S%H6924><s%> of the east

וְהָלְכ֤וּ <S%H1980><s%> went בָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> And his sons וְעָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> and hold מִשְׁתֶּ֔ה <S%H4960><s%> A feast בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> [in their] houses אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one יוֹמ֑וֹ <S%H3117><s%> his day וְשָׁלְח֗וּ <S%H7971><s%> and sent וְקָרְאוּ֙ <S%H7121><s%> and called לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> for their three [אַחְיֹתֵיהֶם כ] (אַחְיֹֽותֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H269><s%> other ק) לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> to eat וְלִשְׁתּ֖וֹת <S%H8354><s%> and to drink עִמָּהֶֽם׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> become כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> When הִקִּיפֽוּ֩ <S%H5362><s%> were gone about יְמֵ֨י <S%H3117><s%> And it was so when the days הַמִּשְׁתֶּ֜ה <S%H4960><s%> of [their] feasting וַיִּשְׁלַ֧ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אִיּ֣וֹב <S%H347><s%> that Job וַֽיְקַדְּשֵׁ֗ם <S%H6942><s%> and sanctified וְהִשְׁכִּ֣ים <S%H7925><s%> them and rose up early בַּבֹּקֶר֮ <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וְהֶעֱלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> and offered עֹלוֹת֮ <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings מִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> [according] to the number כֻּלָּם֒ <S%H3605><s%> all כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> When אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said אִיּ֔וֹב <S%H347><s%> of them all for Job אוּלַי֙ <S%H194><s%> It may be חָטְא֣וּ <S%H2398><s%> have sinned בָנַ֔י <S%H1121><s%> that my sons וּבֵרֲכ֥וּ <S%H1288><s%> and cursed אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God בִּלְבָבָ֑ם <S%H3824><s%> in their hearts כָּ֛כָה <S%H3602><s%> Thus יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> Thus did אִיּ֖וֹב <S%H347><s%> Job כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> continually פ

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> now there was הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Now there was a day וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> came בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> when the sons הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God לְהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <S%H3320><s%> to present עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> themselves before the LORD וַיָּב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> came גַֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הַשָּׂטָ֖ן <S%H7854><s%> and Satan בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> also among

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַשָּׂטָ֖ן <S%H7854><s%> unto Satan מֵאַ֣יִן <S%H370><s%> Whence תָּבֹ֑א <S%H935><s%> comest וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הַשָּׂטָ֤ן <S%H7854><s%> thou? Then Satan אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> and said מִשּׁ֣וּט <S%H7751><s%> From going to and fro בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth וּמֵֽהִתְהַלֵּ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and from walking up and down בָּֽהּ׃

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַשָּׂטָ֔ן <S%H7854><s%> unto Satan הֲשַׂ֥מְתָּ <S%H7760><s%> appoint לִבְּךָ֖ <S%H3820><s%> care for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> my servant אִיּ֑וֹב <S%H347><s%> Job כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> is no כָּמֹ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3644><s%> like בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> that [there is] none like him in the earth אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man תָּ֧ם <S%H8535><s%> a perfect וְיָשָׁ֛ר <S%H3477><s%> and an upright יְרֵ֥א <S%H3373><s%> one that feareth אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God וְסָ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> and escheweth מֵרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> evil

וַיַּ֧עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הַשָּׂטָ֛ן <S%H7854><s%> Then Satan אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said הַֽחִנָּ֔ם <S%H2600><s%> free יָרֵ֥א <S%H3372><s%> fear אִיּ֖וֹב <S%H347><s%> Doth Job אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

הֲלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not [אַתְּ כ] (אַ֠תָּה <S%H859><s%> you ק) שַׂ֣כְתָּ <S%H7753><s%> Hast not thou made an hedge בַעֲד֧וֹ <S%H1157><s%> about him and about וּבְעַד־ <S%H1157><s%> about בֵּית֛וֹ <S%H1004><s%> his house וּבְעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֖וֹ מִסָּבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> every מַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יָדָיו֙ <S%H3027><s%> of his hands בֵּרַ֔כְתָּ <S%H1288><s%> abundantly וּמִקְנֵ֖הוּ <S%H4735><s%> and his substance פָּרַ֥ץ <S%H6555><s%> is increased בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land

וְאוּלָם֙ <S%H199><s%> But שְֽׁלַֽח־ <S%H7971><s%> put forth נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now יָֽדְךָ֔ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand וְגַ֖ע <S%H5060><s%> now and touch בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֑וֹ אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thee to thy face יְבָרֲכֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H1288><s%> curse

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַשָּׂטָ֗ן <S%H7854><s%> unto Satan הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לוֹ֙ בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> Behold all that he hath [is] in thy power רַ֣ק <S%H7535><s%> but אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> only upon himself put not forth יָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> went forth הַשָּׂטָ֔ן <S%H7854><s%> So Satan מֵעִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> from פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from the presence יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And there was a day וּבָנָ֨יו <S%H1121><s%> when his sons וּבְנֹתָ֤יו <S%H1323><s%> and his daughters אֹֽכְלִים֙ <S%H398><s%> [were] eating וְשֹׁתִ֣ים <S%H8354><s%> and drinking יַ֔יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine בְּבֵ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> house אֲחִיהֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> brother's הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <S%H1060><s%> in their eldest

וּמַלְאָ֛ךְ <S%H4397><s%> a messenger בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> And there came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִיּ֖וֹב <S%H347><s%> unto Job וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said הַבָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> The oxen הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become חֹֽרְשׁ֔וֹת <S%H2790><s%> were plowing וְהָאֲתֹנ֖וֹת <S%H860><s%> and the asses רֹע֥וֹת <S%H7462><s%> feeding עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> beside

וַתִּפֹּ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> fell שְׁבָא֙ <S%H7614><s%> And the Sabeans וַתִּקָּחֵ֔ם <S%H3947><s%> [upon them] and took them away וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּעָרִ֖ים <S%H5288><s%> the servants הִכּ֣וּ <S%H5221><s%> yea they have slain לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> with the edge חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword וָֽאִמָּ֨לְטָ֧ה <S%H4422><s%> and I only am escaped רַק־ <S%H7535><s%> but אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I לְבַדִּ֖י <S%H905><s%> alone לְהַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> alone to tell לָֽךְ׃

ע֣וֹד ׀ <S%H5750><s%> was still זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> another מְדַבֵּ֗ר <S%H1696><s%> While he [was] yet speaking וְזֶה֮ <S%H2088><s%> another בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> there came וַיֹּאמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> also another and said אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> The fire אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God נָֽפְלָה֙ <S%H5307><s%> is fallen מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven וַתִּבְעַ֥ר <S%H1197><s%> and hath burned up בַּצֹּ֛אן <S%H6629><s%> the sheep וּבַנְּעָרִ֖ים <S%H5288><s%> and the servants וַתֹּאכְלֵ֑ם <S%H398><s%> and consumed וָאִמָּ֨לְטָ֧ה <S%H4422><s%> them and I only am escaped רַק־ <S%H7535><s%> but אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I לְבַדִּ֖י <S%H905><s%> alone לְהַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> alone to tell לָֽךְ׃

ע֣וֹד ׀ <S%H5750><s%> was still זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> another מְדַבֵּ֗ר <S%H1696><s%> While he [was] yet speaking וְזֶה֮ <S%H2088><s%> another בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> there came וַיֹּאמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> also another and said כַּשְׂדִּ֞ים <S%H3778><s%> The Chaldeans שָׂ֣מוּ ׀ <S%H7760><s%> made out שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> three רָאשִׁ֗ים <S%H7218><s%> bands וַֽיִּפְשְׁט֤וּ <S%H6584><s%> and fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַגְּמַלִּים֙ <S%H1581><s%> upon the camels וַיִּקָּח֔וּם <S%H3947><s%> and have carried them away וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּעָרִ֖ים <S%H5288><s%> the servants הִכּ֣וּ <S%H5221><s%> yea and slain לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> with the edge חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword וָאִמָּ֨לְטָ֧ה <S%H4422><s%> and I only am escaped רַק־ <S%H7535><s%> but אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I לְבַדִּ֖י <S%H905><s%> alone לְהַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> alone to tell לָֽךְ׃

עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> against זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> another מְדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> While he [was] yet speaking וְזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> another בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> there came וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> also another and said בָּנֶ֨יךָ <S%H1121><s%> Thy sons וּבְנוֹתֶ֤יךָ <S%H1323><s%> and thy daughters אֹֽכְלִים֙ <S%H398><s%> [were] eating וְשֹׁתִ֣ים <S%H8354><s%> and drinking יַ֔יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine בְּבֵ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> house אֲחִיהֶ֥ם <S%H251><s%> brother's הַבְּכֽוֹר׃ <S%H1060><s%> in their eldest
